item.title: Setting up a Windows laptop/workstation
item.description: I created a public github repo with steps on how I customize a Windows workstation to my liking. Plan is to update and automate parts of it. https://github.com/avhb/windows-setup

item.title: Books
item.description: I am always on the lookout for recommendations, send me your number one book recommendation via email (see about page for contact details) please put [book recommendation] in the subject line. This is a page first and foremost for myself, to track what I have read, what I found good and what I want to read in the future. There is a mix of English and Dutch books, in most cases a translated version is available, use your google-fu to find itðŸ˜‰.

item.title: About
item.description: Arne Vanheesbeke I am a 20-something Test Engineer, based in Kortijk, Belgium. Why I am creating this website This website is a place where I intend to share what I learn, this is supposed to help me process the knowledge better and can serve as a reference for myself as well. Also as a directory of cool stuff I find, things I like (like books, films, interesting websitesâ€¦) In the near future, I intend to share learnings about testing, my homelab, automation and other things.
